loans.name: Arafat

texts.en:
Arafat is a 23-year-old married man from Gaza City. He lives with his wife and one small daughter in a simple house. For the past year, Arafat has been transferring goods in the local market using his rickshaw. It is a good business, but the income is not stable.

Arafat took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new engine for his rickshaw. By taking this loan, Arafat will be able to improve his business and increase his productivity. 

Arafat appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a new engine for his rickshaw.

loans.name: Joy

texts.en:
Joy is a 28-year-old married woman with two children who are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Joy has a banana vending business in the Philippines. Joy requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock of bananas to sell to her customers.

Joy has been in this business for two years. In the future, Joy would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stock of bananas to sell to her customers

loans.name: Plamedi Group

texts.fr: La cliente Munyutsa est une commerçante et membre d’un collectif  d’affaires «Plamedi», entrepreneur dynamique, âgée de 30 ans, mariée et mère de 5 enfants dont 2 étudient et 3 autres sont encore gamins. La cliente est  une vendeuse des divers matériels d’ustensile de cuisine. Elle étale sa marchandise sur la route principale de la ville. Elle commença ses business avec  de fonds reçu comme prêt de l’IMF  Hekima. Son conjoint est un taximan de motocyclette. Il y a 9 ans qu’elle exerce cette activité. Ce nouveau prêt va la servir d’acheter 10 casseroles métalliques neuves, gobelets, assiettes,  cuillères et fourchettes.  Ainsi, elle souhaite accroitre son capital, scolariser, vêtir, et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie fortement Hekima pour l’autonomisation des femmes entrepreneurs non bancables, surtout; pendant ce moment critique post conflits à l’Est du pays. Il sied de signaler qu’une cliente porte  son bébé.
texts.en: The borrower, Munyutsa, is a retailer and a member of the business group "Plamedi".  She is 30 years old, married, and the mother of five children, two of whom are in school while the other three are still quite young.  She is also a dynamic entrepreneur who sells various kitchen utensils.  She displays her goods along the city's main road.  She started in this business with a loan received from the micro-finance institution Hekima.  Munyutsa's husband works as a moped taxi driver.  Munyutsa herself has been involved in her field of work for nine years.  She will use this new loan to buy 10 new metal cooking pots, some cups, plates, spoons and forks.  She would like to increase her capital which will allow her to feed, clothe and educate her children.  In the end, she wishes to thank Hekima for empowering female entrepreneurs excluded from the banking system, particularly during this difficult post-conflict period in eastern Congo.  It should be noted that one of the borrowers featured in the photo is carrying her baby.

loans.use: to buy 10 new metal cooking pots, some cups, plates, spoons and forks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an overlock sewing machine, a coverstitch machine, and a flatbed sewing machine

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 26-year-old married man from Gaza. He lives with his wife and two sons and one daughter in a simple house. For the past twelve years, he has been working in fishing using his boat. It is a good business, but the income is not stable.

Mohammad took a 600 USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him buy a new engine for his boat. By receiving this loan, he will be able to improve his business and increase his productivity. 

Mohammad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new engine for his fishing boat.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy home appliances

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah works hard to support her family. Leah is married and has a fabric printing business in the Philippines.

Leah requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more materials for her business.

Leah has been in this business for eight years now.

Leah would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more materials for her business.

loans.name: Ian

texts.en:
Ian is a married man with one child. He is a very hard-working entrepreneur. He is 37 years old and has one child who is currently in school.

Ian has a fishing business in the Philippines. He requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase materials and tools for the maintenance of his fishing business.

Ian has been in this business for 22 years. He would like to build and expand his business to secure the future of his family.

loans.use: to purchase materials and tools for the maintenance of his fishing business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his sister's study.

loans.name: Lita

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Lita works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell dry goods business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from farming sugarcane. Lita is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to buy more stocks of dry goods like shades, belts, watches, etc. to sell for her buy-and-sell dry goods business.

Lita has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of dry goods like shades, belts, watches, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Engracia

texts.en:

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional goods like candies, biscuits, shampoo, sanitary pads, detergent soap, and toothpaste to sell. 

Engracia has borrowed and paid 15 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from farming sugarcane.

She aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional goods like candies, biscuits, shampoo, sanitary pads, detergent soap, and toothpaste to sell.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets, feed, and other supplies for her business

Nelly has been in pig fattening for 20 years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.name: Pacita

Pacita is 51 years old and single with four children.

Pacita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock like canned goods, cooking oil, seasonings, sugar, coffee, etc. to sell.

Pacita has borrowed and repaid two loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns additional income from raising pigs.

Pacita aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock like canned goods, cooking oil, seasonings, sugar, coffee, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy equipment for her hairdresser business including a hair dryer, flat iron, hair-tonger, rollers and combs as well as hair relaxer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more goats in order to raise and sell them.

loans.name: Wisam

texts.en:
Wisam is a 43-year-old, married woman. She is from a small village near Tulkarem city, called Attel. She is the mother of four kids -- two sons and two daughters. Her husband works in a bakery he owns. The bakery is a good business, but the family's expenses are high. Wisam works also, on the family's land, where she plants seasonal fruits and vegetables, using greenhouses.

Wisam took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy more seeds and seedlings for her farm. By taking this loan, Wisam will be able to improve her business and increase the farm's productivity.

Wisam was photographed while she was working

loans.use: to buy more seeds and seedlings for her farm.

loans.name: Joel Esau

texts.es:
Joel tiene 27 años de edaad, está soltero y vive con su  madre y hermanos. Es un joven emprendedor que sabe lo que quiere.

El joven es agricultor, también se dedica a hacer viajes con el camión a quien lo busca, el camión es de su madre, la obediencia que ha presentado lo ha llevado a tomar decisiones en su casa, mientras sus padre estaba vivo le enseñó todo  lo relacionado al trabajo en el campo, también se dedica al cuido del ganado de la familia. Sus hermanos gemelos se involucran también en los trabajos de la casa.

El préstamo será invertido en la reparación del techo de su casa, ya cuenta con una parte de la madera para iniciar, lo que comprará es teja, clavos, regla, etc. el mejoramiento en la calidad de vida será el tener un lugar mas digno que cuando llueva no tendrá que preocuparse por que se vaya a mojar.


Sus sueños a futuro es trabajar para tener sus propias cosas.
texts.en:
Joel is a 27-year-old young man. He is single and lives with his mother and siblings. He is a young entrepreneur who knows what he wants. Joel is a farmer and also gives trips with his mother's truck to those who request it. Her obedience led him to make decisions about his home. While his father was alive he taught him everything related to work in the field. He also cares for his family's cattle. His twin brothers are also involved in the housework.

The loan will be invested in repairing the roof of his house. He has some wood to begin with; now he needs to buy tile, nails, ruler, etc. This improvement in his quality of life will result in a more dignified place where he will not have to worry about getting wet from the rain.

His dreams for the future is to work to have his own things.

loans.use: to buy tile, nails, and a rule to repair the roof of his house

Rosalina has been in this business for seven years now.

Rosalina would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.name: Myrna

Myrna has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF. She will use it to purchase more groceries to sell, at her general store. She has borrowed and repaid four loans from NWTF, before this loan.

She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell, at her general store

loans.name: Phung's Group

texts.en: Phung’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Phung makes a living cultivating rice and she does extra work as farm laborer to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water.  Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water .

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family

loans.name: Al- Sadaka Al- Hodeidah Group

texts.en:
Al- Sadaka Al- Hodeidah is a group which consists of five women from Hodeidah, Yemen. They are requesting a loan of 100,000 YER (Yemen rials) from AMB.

Maryam is a 30-year-old married woman with three children who lives with her husband and her children in a humble house in Hodeidah, Yemen. She works as a tailor. Her business was set up in her place of residence one year ago. She started in her business as a tailor sewing all kinds of clothes for the people in her area.  She started in her own business with a small amount of capital. Little by little, her business began improving more. 

She is very detail-oriented and does very well. This thing allows her to have the loyalty of many customers, friends, and neighbors. She makes modest profits, but most of what she earns goes to the expenses of the family. On the other side, she wants to enlarge her business. For this reason, Maryam is asking for a loan of 20,000 YER from AMB to buy more fabrics in different colors and prints, thread, needles, buttons, and all things she needs in her business.

Maryam looks forward to obtaining better profits to give her family a better quality of life.  She hopes to open a store for selling ready-made women's clothes.

loans.use: to buy more fabrics in different colors and prints, thread, needles, buttons, and all things she needs in her business.

loans.name: Sopheap Phorn's Group

texts.en: Sopheap’s group live in a rural village in Prey Veng province in Cambodia. Sopheap makes a living cultivating rice and also does extra work as a farm laborer to support her family. In their village there is no piped water or reliable well. Between them, the two women in Sopheap’s group have 2 young children who are vulnerable to getting sick as a result of drinking dirty, contaminated water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family

Between them, the members in Phun’s group have 3  young children who are vulnerable to getting sick as a result of drinking dirty, contaminated water. Having a water filter at home will help each member of the group to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water .

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family

texts.en:

Teofila is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Teofila requested a 25,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to purchase additional livestock, feeds and vitamins for her business.

Teofila has been raising livestock for 10 years now, and has borrowed 15 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Teofila would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock, feeds and vitamins for her business

loans.name: Virginia

Virginia has been in this business for four years now.

Virginia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

Whina Mae is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Whina Mae requested a 12,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vaccines and vitamins for her livestock.

Whina Mae has been raising livestock for one year now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Whina Mae would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

Elizabeth has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, biscuits, soft drinks, beers, cooking oil, noodles, etc. 

Elizabeth would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

Estella is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. Estella requested a 11,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Estella has been in pig fattening for five years now, and has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Estella would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn works hard to support her family. Evelyn is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Evelyn requested a 21,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to buy additional stock like soft drinks, beers, sanitary pads, diapers, noodles, cereals, juice, etc., to sell.

Evelyn has been in this business for three years now.

Evelyn would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more women's clothes to resell to the customers in her area.

loans.name: Carmen Yanett

texts.es:
La señora Carmen es una alegre mujer, trabajadora y simpática.
Tiene un minimercado que inicio en compañía de su esposo hace algún tiempo juntando unos ahorros que habían conseguido. Este establecimiento les ha permitido obtener los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar.
Actualmente tienen un local bien ubicado, con un buen flujo de venta y afortunadamente no han tenido dificultades.
Ella desea un crédito para comprar unas estanterías metálicas que le permitan exhibir una mayor cantidad de productos de la canasta familiar y adicional necesita comprar un enfriador para mantener sus productos frescos y ofrecerlos a sus clientes.
Tiene grandes proyectos para su negocio, pues desea abrir otra tienda en el futuro y ofrecer empleo a otras personas.
Es una orgullosa madre de 2 hijos y vive feliz al lado de su esposo.
texts.en:
Carmen is a cheerful, hard-working and nice woman. She has a mini-market that she started with her husband some time ago, combining the savings that they had obtained.

This establishment has allowed them to obtain the income necessary to sustain their home. They currently have a well-located business, with a good flow of sales, and fortunately they haven´t had any difficulties.

She wants a loan to buy some metal shelves that will allow her to exhibit a greater quantity of staple goods, and additionally, she needs to buy a refrigerator to keep her products fresh and offer them to her clients.

She has big plans for her business. She wishes to open another store in the future and offer employment to other people. She is the proud mother of two children and she lives happily alongside her husband.

loans.use: to buy metal shelves and a refrigerator for her business

loans.name: Dalerjon

texts.ru:
Далерчон способный и деятельный молодой человек в возрасте 19 лет. Он еще не женат и живет в городе Конибодом с родителями, сестренкой и младшим братом. Он старший сын в семье. Его родители являются преподавателями в школе. Сестренка и братик учатся еще в школе. Сам Далерчон студент. 

Он учится в первом курсе очного отделения Государственного Коммерческого Университета Таджикистана в факультете "Экономика и торговля". Ему нравится учить предмет экономики и в будущем планирует стать высококвалифицированным экономистом. Одновременно Далерчон занят в сфере услуг. Он в течение года как занимается бизнесом - предоставлением в аренду посуды, столов и стульев для проведения мероприятий. Ему в этом деле помогает отец.
В данный момент Далерчон обратился за кредитом для оплаты за свое двухлетнее обучение в университете и частично для развития своего бизнеса для купли посуды, столов и стульев. Далерчон рад получить данный кредит, так как он имеет относительно низкую процентную ставку.
texts.en: Dalerjon is a capable and active 19 year-old young man. He is not yet married and lives in the city of Konibodom with his parents, sister and younger brother. He is the oldest son in the family. His parents are school teachers. His sister and brother still attend school. Dalerjon is a college student. He attends the first year of the Tajikistan State Commerce University in the "Economy and Retail" division full-time and plans to become a highly qualified economist. Concurrently, Dalerjon is involved in a service business. He has been in the business of providing dishware, tables and chairs for holding events for one year. His father helps him with this business. At the present time, Dalerjon is requesting this loan to pay for his two-year university education and partially to develop his business by purchasing dishes, tables and chairs. Dalerjon is happy to obtain this loan because it has a fairly low interest rate.

loans.use: to pay for his two-year university education and partially to develop his business by purchasing dishes, tables and chairs

loans.name: Hilaria

texts.en:
Hilaria is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 43 years old and has three children who are currently in school.

Hilaria has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional materials for her fishing business.

Hilaria has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials for her fishing business

loans.name: Flora

texts.en:
Flora is a married woman with one child. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 46 years old and has one child who is in school.

Flora has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

Flora has been in this business for seven years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell

loans.name: Indelicia

texts.en:
Indelicia works hard to support her family. She is married and has an ice cream vending business in the Philippines.

Indelicia requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her ice cream production business.

Indelicia has been in this business for five years now.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

In the future, Indelicia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her ice cream production business

loans.name: Joanne

texts.en:
Joanne is 32 years old and married with four children. With two children currently in school, Joanne works very hard to provide for them.

Joanne runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items like canned goods, juice, milk, vinegar, soy sauce, biscuits, etc. to sell.

Joanne has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, juice, milk, vinegar, soy sauce, biscuits, etc.

In the future, Joanne would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more items like canned goods, juice, milk, vinegar, soy sauce, biscuits, etc. to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for clean and efficinet cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for efficient and clean cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Novelita

texts.en:
As the widowed parent of five children, Novelita works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pre-paid mobile load. Novelita is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy items to sell like snack foods, sugar, soap, noodles, canned goods and other groceries for her general store business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Novelita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 13 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like snack foods, sugar, soap, noodles, canned goods and other groceries

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for affordable and effficient cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for efficient and cost effective cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for efficient and affordable cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for efficient, clean and affordable cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina has a live-in partner with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 46 years old and has one child who is currently in school.

Marcelina has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional fishing net for her fishing business.

Marcelina has been in this business for five years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing net for her fishing business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for clean and affordable clean cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for a modern and clean cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for affordable and clean cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rice, beans, oil, sugar, cookies, juices, and other products for a small general store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for a modern and affordable cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for efficient and affordable cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for efficient and clean cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for efficient and affordable cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for clean and affordable cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy poles, metal sheeting and iron to build a porch.

loans.name: Buyunvikane Group

texts.fr: Madame Dunia, femme courageuse et ambitieuse est presidente de la micro entreprise Buyunvikane.  Elle est  âgée  de 45 ans, mère de 11 enfants dont 5 empruntant le chemin de l’école et mariée à un chômeur. Commerçante depuis plus de 20ans au marché public de la place, elle sollicite ce nouveau prêt pour acheter  des divers produits (2cartons de piles, 2 cartons de lait de beauté, etc.)  afin de pouvoir répondre aux besoins de sa clientèle. Son objectif est d’acheter une moto neuve pour qu’elle puisse contribuer à la scolarité de ses enfants et améliorer l’habitat. Ainsi, elle remercie Hekima et la bénie.
texts.en: Dunia is the president of the Buyunvikane micro-enterprise.  She is a courageous and ambitious 45-year-old woman and the mother of 11 children.  Five of her children go to school.  Her husband is unemployed.  She has been working as a market vendor at the local public market for more than 20 years.  In order to meet the needs of her customers, she is requesting this new loan to buy various products (two boxes of batteries, two boxes of skin lotions, etc.) Her goal is to buy a new motorcycle in order to contribute to her children's education and improve her living conditions.  She thanks and blesses (the micro-finance institution) Hekima.

loans.use: to various goods (two boxes of batteries, two boxes of skin lotions, etc.)

loans.name: José Agustín

texts.es: José de 63 años de edad vive en casa propia junto a su esposa y su nieta de 3 años de edad. José se ha dedicado desde hace 25 años a la fotografía, prestando su servicio a domicilio y en cualquier evento que los fines de semana así se le solicita. José es muy conocido en todo el municipio ya que es muy trabajador y honrado. Él está solicitando un crédito a FUSAI para reparar el techo de la cochera ya que como se aprecia en la fotografía la cubierta y la estructura de madera están dañadas. José también pavimentará toda el área de la cochera. Para todo el trabajo José comprará cemento, arena, madera, lámina galvanizada y clavos.
texts.en: Jose is 63 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and 3 year old granddaughter. Jose has worked in photography for 25 years, providing in-home services and at any type of event he's asked to handle on the weekends. Jose is quite famous in town because he's honorable and hard-working. He's requesting a loan from FUSAI to repair the roof of the car port since, as can be seen in the photograph, the cover and wooden structure are damaged. Jose will also pave the entire surface of the car port. For this job Jose will purchase cement, sand, wood, galvanized metal and nails.

loans.use: To purchase cement, sand, wood, galvanized metal and nails to repair the roof and pave the car port.

loans.name: Efrain Luis

texts.es:
El socio Efraín pertenece al banco comunal SAN VALENTIN, el banco esta ubicado en el distrito de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio tiene 62 años de edad tiene 04 hijos y es casado, él socio alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la artesanía, él socio es técnico restaurador, él socio trabaja en una de las galerías artísticas de la ciudad, él socio lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este su trabajo el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, él socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.

El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de pinturas al oleo entre otros .

El socio se siente agradecido por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Efrain is a member of the San Valentin community bank, which is located in the district of Cusco in the department of Cusco. He's 62 years old, is married and has 4 children. The member alternates his daily activities working in crafts, and is a restoration specialist. He works in one of the city's art galleries and has been doing this line of work for a long time, and it's going well thanks to the effort he puts into his business every day. The member is a responsible, diligent person who wants to keep working like this to continue supporting his family. He's requesting the loan to purchase oil paints among other things. The member is grateful for the loan and pledges to keep up with the payments.

loans.use: To purchase oil paint among other things.

loans.name: Eder Jair

texts.es:
Eder vive en la ciudad e Chincha, se dedica a su trabajo como ayudante de albañil desde hace 5 años, con lo cual puede tener ingresos para poder salir adelante, sobre todo porque es casado y es padre de 2 hijos a quienes quiere mucho  por quienes lucha cada dia para salir adelante.

Eder esta agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar una cama para sus hios, ya que actualmente duermen en una cama ambos pequeños y también podrá comprar una cocina, de esta manera podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos y seguirá trabajando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Darle una buena educación a sus hijos”.
texts.en: Eder lives in the city of Chincha, and has been working as a mason's assistant for 5 years. This gives him the income to be able to make ends meet, especially because he's married with two children who he loves very much and he works every day to provide for them. Eder is grateful to Kiva lenders because with the help they've given he'll be able to purchase a bed for his children, since both kids currently sleep in the same bed, and also buy a stove so he can improve his children's quality of life and keep working to make his dream come true: "Provide a good education to his children".

loans.use: To purchase beds and a stove.

loans.name: Simika Group

texts.fr: Madame Muhindo est conseillère de l’association de credit Simika. Vendeuse dans un marché public, elle commença les activités de commerce depuis 2009 à partir de stick d’arbre (boisement). Elle sollicite un nouveau credit pour lui permettre d’acheter 12 caisses de boissons sucrées. Le plus grand obstacle qu’elle rencontre dans ses activités c’est la vente à crédit. Qu’à cela ne tienne, son rêve est d’évoluer et devenir une grande commerçante de la place. Au finish,  Elle remercie Hekima et lui souhaite la prospérité dans ses activités.
texts.en: Muhindo is the representative of the "Simika" credit association.  She works as a retailer at a public market.  She started in this business in 2009 and initially sold tree seedlings.  She is now requesting a new loan in order to buy 12 crates of soft drinks.  The biggest challenge she has to face in her business is the fact that her customers sometimes pay her on credit.  However, she is still determined to succeed, and her dream is to become a major local retailer.  She thanks (the micro-finance institution) Hekima and wishes the organization success in all its activities.

loans.use: to buy twelve crates of soft drinks.

loans.name: Josue Rafael

texts.es:
Josué Rafael es un joven dinámico, alegre, aplicado y muy responsable, que considera que lo que le motiva a continuar sus estudios es el apoyo incondicional de sus padres que lo animan a preparase cada día mas para sobresalir y conseguir un buen trabajo. Piensa que sin educación no hay desarrollo y sabe que su educación ayudará de forma positiva a su familia económicamente y contribuirá al estudios de sus hermanos para que tengan la misma oportunidad que él ha tenido de estudio. "Mis estudios previos a ingresar a la universidad han sido en el área de contabilidad tome el reto de cambiar mi horizonte y opte por estudiar Ingeniería en infotecnología, tengo un año estudiándolo y mi promedio es de 89%. La herramientas de estudios son un apoyo realmente necesario ya que día a día surgen nuevas técnicas de aprendizaje por lo que decidí no quedarme a tras y aprender cada día. Sé que seré un gran profesional,que apoyaré a mi familia y a mi país para ver una nación desarrollada"

"Gracias a los socios de Kiva por darme creer en Fundación como CREHO quienes nos apoyan y creen en nosotros los jóvenes"
texts.en:
Josue Rafael is a dynamic, cheerful, responsible, hard-working young man who believes that what motivates him to continue his education is the unconditional support of his parents who encourage him every day to stand out and get a good job.  He feels that without education there is no development and that it will help his family economically and help his siblings have the same opportunity he had to study.

"My studies prior to university were in the area of accounting, but I decided to change to infotechnology engineering.  I have been studying for a year with an average grade of 89%.  Study tools are a necessary support because every day new learning techniques appear and I did not want to fall behind, rather keep abreast of things.  I know that I will be a good professional and support my family, as well as my country so it can become more developed."

"I am grateful to Kiva lenders for making me believe in foundations such as CREHO who support and believe in young people."

loans.use: To buy study tools.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy pigs.

loans.name: Dora Delia

texts.es:
La socia  es la señorita Dora, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de los Milagros de Chimpahuaylla” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. 
La socia continua dedicándose a enseñar en uno de los colegios de la ciudad, la socia es docente de profesional socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia lleva años dedicándose a este su trabajo el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de  esta manera seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de materiales didácticos.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con su cuota establecidas.
texts.en: Dora is a member of the "Senor de los Milagros de Chimpahuaylla" community bank in the city of Cusco, Peru. The member continues to work in teaching at one of the city's schools. Teaching is her profession and she's a responsible, diligent person who has been doing this job for years. The job has been going well for her thanks to the effort she puts into it every day. She wants to keep working so she can continue supporting her family. The member is requesting the loan to purchase teaching materials, and feels grateful for the loan provided and pledges to comply with the payment plan.

loans.use: To purchase teaching materials.

loans.name: Minda

texts.en:
Minda is 53 years old and widowed with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, chips, etc.

Minda has borrowed and paid back 15 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for nine years and also earns an income from selling vegetables.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Minda aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, chips, etc.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is 49 years old and married with nine children, six of whom are in school.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like soap, sugar, coffee, cream, bread, etc.

Myrna has borrowed and paid back two loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for one year and also earns an income from food vending.

Myrna aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like soap, sugar, coffee, cream, bread, etc

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.en:
Ofelia works hard to support her family. She is married and has a business selling purified drinking water in the Philippines.

Ofelia requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional containers of purified drinking water to sell.

Ofelia has been in this business for four years now, and also earns additional income from a general store.

Ofelia would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Jesús José

texts.es: Jesús José, tiene la edad  de 18 años, está soltero, vive con  sus padres y hermanos los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes, fungicidas y pagar mano de obra en trabajos de siembra y asistencia para la plantación de mamón chino, además de comprar algunas árboles más para terminar de sembrar el área escogida para tal fin, y así poder hacer una siembra y resiembra  a inicio de lluvias esto con el objetivo de aumentar la densidad de plantas por área, además de aprovechar la buena fertilidad del suelo y las condiciones de clima y otras que favorecen al cultivo de mamón chino. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Jesus Jose is 18 years old, single, and lives with the parents and siblings who are his main priority. With his loan he intends to purchase fertilizer, fungicides and labor for planting and helping with the papaya farm. In addition he'll buy some more trees to finish planting in the area selected for this purpose, and that way sow and re-sow at the beginning of the rainy season with the objective of increasing area plant density. This would also take advantage of the soil's fertility and climate conditions and other factors that favor papaya growing. With these improvements to the growing he hopes to make some profit and improve his family's quality of life as well as invest a bit more in the growing area and fulfill a few goals. This is the first loan he's received from FUDECOSUR. He hasn't had previous loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided him easier loan conditions and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To plant papaya trees.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 29,500 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

Lucy has been in this business for eight years. She earns more income from pig fattening.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Lucy has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Olivia

texts.en:
Olivia is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 35 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

Olivia has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 14,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional materials like fishing net, lamps, etc. for her business. She earns additional income from raising pigs.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Olivia has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials like fishing net, lamps, etc. for her business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To purchase merchandise for a shop, clothes selling, shoes, and internet cafe customer service.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase agricultural supplies to help grow and clean her coffee crop.

loans.name: Ramón Antonio

texts.es:
Ramón de 65 años de edad, estudio segundo grado, esta casado y tiene 2 hijos mayores de edad, ellos ya no estudian, solo se dedican a los oficios de la casa, también viven 3 nietos, los cuales estudian primaria, en la escuela de la comunidad.

Ramón, tiene 40 años de estar dedicado a la criá de ganado de repasto y a la agricultura, oficios que aprendió por la misma necesidad de subsistir y como no tiene una profesión académica, se le hacia muy difícil encontrar un empleo formal, es así como logra mantener a su grupo familiar.


Ramón, solicita $800.00,  a CREDICAMPO, para comprar un novillo para engordarlo en repasto, y para sembrar 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz, con esto podrá obtener algunos ingresos, para la alimentación de su grupo familiar.

Ramón, esta planificando ahorrar para ayudar a sus nietas a que se gradúen como profesionales..
texts.en:
Ramon, 65, studied until second grade.  He is married and has two older children.  They are no longer studying, they just help with the housework.  He also lives with three grandchildren, who are studying at the local primary school.

Ramon, has been working for 40 years in the raising of cattle and in agriculture.  He learnt these trades out of necessity to survive.  As he does not have any academic qualifications, it is very difficult to find a formal employment, so he does whatever he can to maintain his family.

Ramon is asking for a loan of $800 from Credicampo to buy a young cow to graze and fatten, and to plant 7,000 square meters of maize.  This will allow him to earn some income so he can feed his family.

Ramon is planning to save so that his granddaughters can graduate as professionals.

loans.use: to buy a young cow to graze and to sow 7,000 square meters of corn, which will help him to cover family expenses.

loans.name: Mirian Amparo

texts.es: Mirian tiene 39 años de edad y vive en el distrito de Maranura en la provincia de la Convencion, Cusco, ella es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que se dedica a la  venta de productos de primera necesidad y verduras. Ella pertenece al banco comunal "Santa Beatriz" y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar arroz y azúcar. Ella agradece a los inversionistas por el apoyo brindado y se compromete a pagar las cuotas con mucha responsabilidad y puntualidad.
texts.en:
Mirian, 39, lives in the district of Maranura in the province of La Convencion in Cusco.  She is an enterprising and hard-working woman who sells basic household products and vegetables. 

She belongs to the communal bank "Santa Beatriz" and in this cycle, she is asking for a loan to buy rice and sugar.  

She is grateful to the investors for their support and she promises to pay off her instalments in a responsible and punctual way.

loans.use: to buy rice and sugar.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: Jose tiene 58 años de edad y vive en el distrito de Maranura de la provincia de La Convención, él desde hace varios años atras pertenece al banco comunal "Santa Beatriz" de la Asociación Arariwa, él se dedica a brindar servicio de transportes y de construcción, él en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del carro. Jose agradece a todos los inversionistas por el préstamo y se compromete para pagar sus cuotas con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Jose, 58, lives in the district of Maranura in the province of La Convencion in Cusco.  

He has been a member of the communal bank "Santa Beatriz" of the Arariwa Association for several years.  

He offers a transport service and works in construction.  He is asking for a loan to service his car.  

He is grateful to the investors for their support and he promises to pay off his instalments in a responsible way.

loans.use: to carry out maintenance work on his car.

loans.name: Diana Patricia

texts.es: Diana es una señora separada de su esposo, tiene 2 hijos de 4 y 8 años de edad de los cuales el mayor asiste a la escuela, Diana se dedica a la crianza de chanchos y  también trabaja de ayudante de un doctor de medicinan para de esta manera conseguir los ingresos suficientes para cubrir los gastos de educación y alimentacion de sus hijos, ella es una señora responsable vive en la casa de su nadre, Diana   va a invertir el crédito en la compra de chanchos para incrementar su negocio y sacar adelante a sus hijos ya que ello son su motivo de vida y trabajo.
texts.en:
Diana, is separated from her husband and   has two children.  One is four and the other is eight.  The eldest goes to school.  

Diana rears pigs and also works as an assistant to a doctor.  This allows her to earn an income to cover education costs and feed her children.  She is a responsible woman who lives in her mother's house.  

She is going to invest the loan in buying more pigs to increase her business and be able to raise her children, who are the motivation behind her work and life.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy goods such as lotions to continue her sales.

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
Graciela de 45 años de edad,  estudio hasta octavo grado, esta casada y tiene 2 hijos, uno estudia 7o Grado y el otro estudia derecho en la universidad. El esposo trabaja en hacer promoción con perifoneo a los negocios que lo contratan.

 Graciela, tiene 20 años de estar dedicada al comercio de ropa tiene un pequeño negocio, con el cual se gana la vida, ya que por la falta de empleos formales en el país, es su única fuente de ingresos, por las mañanas sale a pie a vender por las colonias y mas tarde se ubica en un mercado a vender su ropa.


El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar blusas, pantalones, ropa interior, ropa de niño para todas las edades y también cubrirá algunos gastos de educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Graciela, 45, studied until eighth grade.  She is married with 2 children; one is studying seventh grade and the other is studying law at university. Her husband works as a mobile audio advertiser for businesses who hire him.

She has been working for 20 years in the clothing trade.  She has a small business, with which she earns a living.  Due to the lack of any real jobs in the country, it is her sole source of income.  In the morning she goes out on foot to sell in the surrounding areas and later she sets up a stall in the market to sell her clothes.

She is asking for a loan from CREDICAMPO to buy blouses, trousers, underwear, children's clothing for all ages and also to cover some education costs for her children.

loans.use: to buy blouses, trousers, underwear, children's clothes for all ages; and also to cover some of her own children's education costs.

loans.name: José María

texts.es:
José de 58 años de edad, se graduó como bachiller contador, pero después murieron sus padres, lo que le dificulto que continuara sus estudios, esta casado y tiene 4 hijos, los cuales estudian en la escuela de su comunidad,la esposa se dedica a vender mariscos en pequeñas cantidades, en el mercado.

José, tiene 30 años de experiencia, en el manejo de ganado de repasto y agricultura, esto lo aprendió con su papá, ya que era la única actividad que ellos hacían para subsistir, José, todos los días se mantiene en su parcela haciendo labores agrícolas, para desarrollar bien su cultivo y obtener buenos resultados.


José solicita $1,000.00, a CREDICAMPO, para comprar una vaca y para comprar todos los insumos para sembrar 7000 metros cuadrados de pipianera.

Él esta planificando ahorrar, para comprar unas 3 vacas lecheras, para obtener ingresos de venta de leche, con lo que ayudara a mejorar la alimentación de sus hijos y darles estudio.
texts.en:
Jose, 58, graduated from high school as an accountant, but when his parents died, it made it difficult to continue his studies.  He is married and has 4 children, who are studying at the local school.  His wife sells seafood in small quantities at the market.

Jose, has 30 years of experience in grazing livestock and in agriculture.  He learnt these trades from his father, since it was the only activity that they could do to survive.  Every day Jose maintains his plot of land doing agricultural labor so his crops develop and he can get good results from them.

Jose is asking for a loan of $1,000 from Credicampo to buy a cow and to purchase all the nesssary supplies for sowing 7,000 square meters of pumpkin seeds.

He is planning to save to buy about three dairy cows to make money from milk sales, which will help him to improve his children's diet and provide them with education.

loans.use: to buy a cow and to buy the necessary supplies to sow 7,000 square meters of pumpkin seeds.

loans.name: Rubenia Del Rosario

texts.es:
Rubenia de 40 años de edad,  esta casada y vive con sus dos hijos los cuales están estudiando uno primer grado y el otro tercer grado, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura trabaja en ello desde hace 15 años.


Rubenia se dedica a las hortalizas trabaja en ello desde hace 8 años, trabajo que lo aprendió de su esposo, debido a la falta de empleo formal y por la necesidad de subsistencia, ellos viajan todos los días al terreno caminando, trabajan todo el día. 


Rubenia solicita un préstamo en CREDICAMPO, para sembrar 14,000 metros cuadrados de pipian y 7,000  de maíz, la cual vende en elote, esta actividad la realizan todo el año ya que viven a la orilla de un rio. 

Rubenia sueña con tener un sistema de riego por aspersión, para hacer agricultura diversificada, lo que mejorara sus ingresos, para que sus hijos estudien y sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Rubenia, 40, is married and lives with her two children.  One of them is studying first grade and the other third.  Her husband works in agriculture, a job he has been doing for 15 years.

Rubenia grows vegetables.  She has been doing this for eight years.  She learned from her husband because of the lack of formal employment at the time and the need to survive financially.  Every day they walk to their place of work and work all day. 

She is asking for a loan from Credicampo to sow 14,000 square meters of pumpkin seeds and 7,000 of maize, which she sells as sweetcorn.  They do this work all year round as they live on the banks of a river. 
 
She dreams of having her own irrigation system, to be able to have a wider range of agricultural products which will improve her income.  This will allow her to support her children in their studies so they can become professionals.

loans.use: to sow 14,000 square meters of pumpkin seeds and 7,000 square meters of corn.

loans.name: Petronila Del Carmen

texts.es:
Petronila de 37 años de edad, es viuda, tiene 5 hijos de 5, 8, 11, 14 y 15 años de edad los cuales 4 viven con ella y están estudiando, Petronila no pudo estudiar debido a la pobreza en que vivían sus padres.
Petronila se dedica a la agricultura y siembra de hortalizas en la época de invierno y en el verano se dedica a la crianza de pollos y cerdos, trabajo que aprendió de sus padres. Petronila viaja un kilometro para llegar a su trabajo, en el cual permanece en el horario de 6:00 am a 12 del mediodía y de 1:00 pm a 4:00 pm.
El préstamo que esta solicitando en CREDICAMPO, es para la compra de fertilizantes para la siembra de granos básicos y hortalizas.
Petronila sueña con mejorar su negocio, darles estudios a sus hijos y poder mejorar su vivienda para tener una mejor calidad de vida junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Petronila is 37 years old. She is a widow and has 5 children, aged 5, 8, 11, 14 and 15. Four of them live for her and they are in school. Petronila couldn't go to school due to the poverty her parents lived in.   

Petronila works in farming. She plants vegetables in the wintertime and in the summer she raises chickens and pigs. She learned this work from her parents. Petronila travels a kilometer to get to her work. She stays there from 6:00 am to 12 noon and from 1:00 pm to 4:00 pm.

The loan she is asking for from CREDICAMPO is to buy fertilizer to plant basic grains and vegetables. Petronila dreams of improving her business, giving her children and education, and being able to improve her home so she can have a better quality of life with her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to plant basic grains and vegetables.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel vive en la ciudad de Chincha, cada dí trabaja con mucho esfuerzo en su empleo como enfermero en un hospital de su ciudad, trabajo que realiza con mucho gusto ya que desde pequeño siempre ha querido ayudar a los demás.

Miguel está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar materiales de construcción para poder colocar seguir realizando mejoras en su vvienda como tarrajear las paredes y pintado; de esta manera podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y podrá seguir esforzándose para poder mejorar su calidad de vida y seguir luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Seguir estudiando y tener su propia clínica”.
texts.en:
Miguel lives in the city of Chincha. Every day he works very hard in his job in a hospital in his city. He does this work very happily because since he was little he has wanted to help others.

Miguel is grateful to the Kiva lenders since thanks to the help they have offered, he will be able to buy construction materials so that he can do some home improvements, such as plaster and paint the walls. This way, he can improve his quality of life and keep working to improve his quality of life and keep fighting to make his big dream come true: keep studying and have his own clinic.

loans.use: to do home improvement.

loans.name: Joseth

texts.es: Joseph, tiene la edad  de 25 años, está en unión libre, vive con su esposa  que es su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes, fungicidas y pagar mano de obra en trabajos de conservación de suelos para que el agua de lluvia no erosione la fertilidad del suelo y así mantener los suelos en buenas condiciones  y para la asistencia para el café, además de comprar algunas plantas de almácigo que tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad para hacer resiembras a inicio de lluvias esto con el objetivo de aumentar la densidad de plantas por área, además de aprovechar la buena fertilidad del suelo y las condiciones de clima y otras que favorecen al cultivo de café. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Joseph is 25 years old. He is in a common law marriage. He lives with his wife, who is his main priority. With his loan, he intends to buy fertilizer, fungicide and pay for the labor for soil conservation work so that the rain doesn't erode the soil fertility and he can keep it in good condition and help the coffee. He will also buy some seedlings that are well developed and healthy so he can do re-planting when the rains begin. The objective is to increase the density of plants per area, in addition to taking advantage of the good soil fertility and weather conditions and more that favor growing coffee. With these crop improvements he hopes to make a little but of profit and thus improve his family's quality of life and also invest a little more in the crops and meet some goals. This is the first loan he will receive from FUDECOSUR. He hasn't had any other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with more ease of payment and a much lower rate of interest.

loans.use: help his coffee plants.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy manure, fertiliser, pesticide and weedkiller.

loans.name: Zawadi Group

texts.fr: La cliente Charlotte est une commerçante depuis 11 ans et membre d’un collectif d’affaires « Zawadi», entrepreneur, dynamique âgée de 48 ans, mariée et mère de 10 enfants, qui tous étudient. Elle est vendeuse  souliers. Elle installe son business dans un marché centre de la ville. Elle sollicite un prêt auprès de Hekima pour accroitre ses activités. Elle va acheter 40 paires de souliers. Son conjoint est un médecin. Elle avait débuté avec de fonds reçu de son mari. Dans l’avenir, elle souhaite scolariser et nourrir  ses enfants. Elle remercie Hekima pour avoir bien choisi sa cible, en apportant un soutien aux femmes entrepreneurs exclues du système bancaire classique, tout en  leur accordant des crédits sans garantie matérielle, surtout, pendant, la période post conflit dans la région de l’Est Pays.
texts.en:
Charlotte has been selling shoes for 11 years and is a member of the business group Zawadi. She is a dynamic entrepreneur, 48 years old, married, and a mother of ten children, who all go to school. She is married to a doctor. Charlotte started her business with funds from her husband.

Charlotte conducts her business in a central town market. She is seeking a loan with Hekima in order to expand her business. She is going to buy 40 pairs of shoes.

In the future, she would like to [continue to] feed and educate her children. 

Charlotte thanks Hekima for having chosen to support female entrepreneurs, who are excluded from the traditional banking system, without requiring collateral; especially during this post-conflict period in the east of the country.

loans.use: to buy 40 pairs of shoes

loans.name: Tiessiri Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe TIESSIRI est composé de femmes mariées elles ont en moyenne 44 ans et 5 enfants. Elles vivent tous dans des familles traditionnelles dans la ville de Fana, quartier Fana Coura, commune de Guégnéka, préfecture de Dioïla, Région de Koulikoro, (deuxième région administrative de la république du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Elles font le commerce de savon, de l’habillement, d’oignon, de patate et de poterie.
Les femmes du groupe TIESSIRI sont à leur troisième prêt solidaire. Dans le but de satisfaire la demande énorme de leurs clientèles, elles font recours à SORO YIRIWASO.
La cliente MARIAM , deuxième personne à partir de la droite n’est pas instruite, elle est actuellement vendeuse de patate. Elle compte achète 4 sacs de patate chez ses fournisseurs au marché hebdomadaire. La vente se fait en détail et en espèce chez elle et au marché journalier de fana à une clientèle mixte. Elle envisage réaliser un bénéfice moyen mensuel de 70 000 FCFA qui sera réinvesti dans son activité.
texts.en:
The Tiessiri group is made up of married women who, on average, are 44 years old and have five children. She all live in traditional families in the town of Fana, Fana Coura neighborhood, Guégnéka commune, Dioïla prefecture, Koulikoro region (the second administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The group members know each other from family, neighborhood, and friendship ties.

The women sell soap, clothing, onions, potatoes, and pottery. 

With the goal of meeting the great demand from their customers, the group members decided to join Soro Yiriwaso. They are on their third group loan.

Mariam, standing second from the right of the photo, has not been to school. She sells potatoes.

She plans to buy four sacs of potatoes from suppliers at the weekly markets. She will then resell her goods at retail from her house and from Fana's daily market to a mixed group of customers. 

Mariam hopes to earn an average monthly profit of 70,000 francs CFA, which will be reinvested back into her business.

loans.use: to buy potatoes

loans.name: Efrain

texts.es:
Efraín tiene 46 años de edad, no estudio por la situación económica que vivían sus padres. Esta acompañado  y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos. Tiene un hijo que actualmente estudia noveno grado en la escuela, con el vive su suegra, su esposa y su hijo.

Efraín se dedica a la siembra de granos básicos como maíz, frijol y maicillo. En ocasiones cuando encuentra trabajo de ayudante de albañil realiza esta actividad, cuenta que desde hace 25 años se dedica a realizar trabajos agrícolas. Sus padres no pudieron darle educación por la pobreza que vivían, cuando fue creciendo lo llevaban al campo al principio a dejar alimentos a los trabajadores y cuando fue creciendo lo enseñaron a realizar el trabajo agrícola, fue así como aprendió y decidió dedicarse a ello. Siempre ha sido jornalero, una parcela donde va trabajar está a 3 minutos de su casa y la otra parcela le queda a 30 minutos, y se traslada a pie porque es un cerro donde trabaja. 

El crédito lo necesita para comprar los insumos agrícolas como 4 quintales de fórmula, 8 quintales de sulfato, 1 galón de paracuat, 1 galón de amina, 2 k de gesaprin y con el resto pagara la mano de obra ya que solo para la siembra necesita 17 jornales, además invertirá parte  del financiamiento en la siembra de frijol. Con el crédito cubrirá la necesidad de poder comprar todos los insumos pues de lo contario se le haría muy difícil.

El sueño de Efraín es comprar una parcela de terreno donde poder extenderse más con la producción  con la intención de vender las cosechas y tener una mejor calidad de vida para él y su familia, el préstamo le ayudara ya que ha sido ágil el trámite y se le ha apoyado cuando hay otras instituciones que no toman en cuenta los agricultores cuando tramitan un financiamiento.
texts.en:
Efraín is 46 years old. Because of the economic situation of his parents, he could not go to school. He has a wife and she takes care of the household chores. He has a son who is currently in the 9th grade at school. Efraín lives with his mother-in-law, his wife, and their son.

Efraín grows basic grains like corn, beans, and sorghum. Sometimes he finds additional jobs as hired help in construction work and then he makes use of this opportunity. He says he has worked in farming for 25 years. His parents could not send him go to school because they lived in poverty. When he grew up, they took him with them to the field, at first to take food to the workers and, when he was older, they taught him how to work the land. This is how he learnt it and how he decided to work in farming. He has always been a farm laborer. One of the plots where he works is 3 minutes away from his home, and the other one is 30 minutes away. He goes there on foot, because it is in the mountains.

Efraín needs a loan to buy agricultural supplies, like four quintals of formula, 9 quintals of sulfate, 1 gallon of paraquat, 1 gallon of amine, 2 kilos of gesaprim, and with the rest of the money he will pay for hired help, because for the sowing only he needs 17 day wages. Also, he will invest a part of the loan in planting beans. With the loan he will be able to buy all the supplies he needs, which would be very difficult otherwise.

It is Efraín’s dream to buy a plot of land where he can grow more plants and sell the harvest, and to have a better quality of life for himself and his family. The loan will help him, because the process to get it is flexible and he was supported. There are other institutions who do not take farmers into account for their credits.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies like 4 quintals of formula, 8 quintals of sulfate, 1 gallon of paraquat, 1 gallon of amine, 2 kilos of gesaprin, and to pay for hired help, and to plant beans.

loans.name: Juán Elias

texts.es: Juán Elias, tiene la edad  de 39 años, está casado, vive con sus hijos y esposa  que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes, fungicidas y pagar mano de obra en trabajos de asistencia para el café, además de comprar algunas plantas de almácigo para hacer resiembras a inicio de lluvias esto con el objetivo de aumentar la densidad de plantas por área, además de aprovechar la buena fertilidad del suelo y las condiciones de clima y otras que favorecen al cultivo de café. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: 39-year-old Juán Elias is married and lives with his wife and children who are the most important things in his life. he plans to use the loan to buy fertiliser and fungicide and to pay works to help him with his coffee crop. He will also buy some seedlings to sow at the beginning of the rainy season so that he can have a greater density of plants and also make the most of the good fertility of the soil, the climate and other conditions which are conducive to growing coffee. By improving his crops in this way, he hopes to make some income so he can improve his family's living conditions and also invest a bit more in his plantation.  This will enable him to achieve some of this goals. It is his first loan from FUDECOSUR.  He had not previously had any loans from state banks, but FUDESCOSUR granted him the loan with better conditions and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to look after his coffee crops

loans.name: Danaya Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe DANAYA est composé de femmes mariées elles ont en moyenne 36 ans et 4 enfants. Elles vivent tous dans des familles traditionnelles dans la ville de Fana, quartier Badialan, commune de Guégnéka, préfecture de Dioïla, Région de Koulikoro, (deuxième région administrative de la république du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Elles font le commerce de bois, de charbon, d’huile, de savon, d’habillement et de la patte d’arachide.
Les femmes du groupe DANAYA sont à leur seizième prêt solidaire. Dans le but de satisfaire la demande énorme de leurs clientèles, elles font recours à SORO YIRIWASO.
La cliente FADIMA , première personne à partir de la droite dans le rang des assis n’est pas instruite, elle est actuellement vendeuse de pâte d’arachide. Elle compte achète des petits sceaux en plastique et 5 sacs d’arachides non décortique sur place chez les grossistes au marché 
qu’elle  décortique puis le transforme en pâte d’arachide de qualité. La sera mise dans des seaux ensuite vendus en détail et en espèce chez elle à une clientèle mixte. Elle envisage réaliser un bénéfice moyen mensuel de 50 000 FCFA qui sera réinvesti dans son activité.
texts.en:
The Danaya group is made up of married women who, on average, are 36 years old and have four children. They all live in traditional families in the town of Fana, in the Badialan neighborhood, Guégnéka commune, Dioïla prefecture, Koulikoro region (second administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The group members know each other from family, neighborhood, and friendship ties.

These women sell wood, charcoal, oil, soap, clothing, and groundnut paste. 

With the goal of meeting the great demand from their customers, the group decided to join Soro Yiriwaso. They are on their 16th group loan. 

Fadima, the first person seated from the right of the photo, has not been to school. She works selling groundnut paste. 

She plans to buy some plastic buckets and five sacs of groundnuts from wholesalers at the market. She will then de-shell the groundnuts and make them into high quality groundnut paste. She [divides the paste] into the buckets and sells them at retail to a mixed group of customers.

Fadima hopes to earn an average monthly profit of 50,000 francs CFA which she will reinvest back into her business.

loans.use: to buy groundnuts to make groundnut paste

loans.name: Mary Eileen

texts.en:
Mary Eileen is 41 years old and married with two children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell such as canned goods, eggs, milk, soap, etc.

Mary Eileen has borrowed and repaid 5 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 5 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Mary Eileen aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell such as canned goods, eggs, milk, soap, etc

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Evelyn works hard to support her family.

She has a rice farming business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Evelyn is borrowing PHP 26,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies for her rice farming business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Evelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 14 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as cement and bricks to build additional rooms besides the first one

loans.name: Florencia

texts.en:
Florencia is 59 years old and married. Florencia works very hard to provide for them.

Florencia's business and family home was destroyed by super typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Florencia has restarted her business and now needs to provide her family with a safe shelter.

Florencia has taken a PHP 9,600 housing loan through NWTF to purchase materials to rebuild her family home.

She is using this loan to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

Florencia is committed to rebuild her devastated life and would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Hermenia

texts.en:
Hermenia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF to buy fishing materials for her fishing business.

Hermenia has been in this business for 3 years. Hermenia earns additional income from buying and selling fish.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Hermenia has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials for her business

loans.name: Cirila

texts.en:
Cirila is 55 years old and married with two children. 

Cirila is in the agricultural business, farming corn in the Philippines. Cirila requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy seeds, fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Cirila has been farming corn for 20 years now, and has borrowed 12 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Cirila would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Salam Al-Qadysiah Group

texts.en:
Salam Al-Qadysiah group consists of three women who live in Sana'a, Yemen. They applied for a loan in the amount of 180,000 from Al-Amal Microfinance Bank.

Sameera, 36 years old, is a married woman and the leader of the group. She is a university graduate and works as a school teacher. Sameera loves teaching very much, and she enjoys it irregardless of the low salary that she gets. She is keen to do anything to perform her job well and benefit her students. Sameera believes that the Internet is one of the good resources for access to knowledge, and she can use it to search and learn new ways of teaching and new teaching materials. The only problem is that she doesn’t have enough money to purchase a computer because both her husband and her salary hardly cover their living expenses; therefore, she decided to apply for a loan from Al-Amal Microfinance Bank in the amount of 70,000 YER.

Sameera looks forwards to having her own house, and she hopes that Al-Amal Microfinance Bank can help her to realize her dream in the future.

loans.use: to buy a computer

loans.name: Nena

texts.en:
Nena is 44-years-old, married and has three children who are in school.

Nena and her family survived super typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013, but her business and family home were wiped out. 

Nena is taking out a housing loan amounting PHP 9,500 to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to build a house for her family. 

Nena has been a NWTF borrower since 2013 and plans to recover through her business buying and selling ready to wear.

With your help, Nena can rebuild her house and rebound from the devastation of super typhoon Haiyan. In future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 62-years-old and married with three children. Elizabeth works very hard to provide for them.

Elizabeth runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries like soft drinks, detergent soap, hair conditioners, shampoo, noodles, canned goods, etc. to sell.

Elizabeth has been in this business for seven years and sells a variety of items such as soft drinks, detergent soap, hair conditioners, shampoo, noodles, canned goods, etc. 

Elizabeth would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries like soft drinks, detergent soap, hair conditioners, shampoo, noodles, canned goods, etc. to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more perfumes and incense to resell for her customers.

loans.name: Maura Antonia

texts.es:
Maura de 56 años de edad, es casada, tiene 4 hijos de 5, 6, 17 y 25 años de edad, los cuales 3 se encuentran estudiando. Maura estudio hasta primer grado, no pudo continuar sus estudios debido a la situación económica que vivían sus padres, su esposo trabaja como empleado.
Maura se dedica a la agricultura y hortalizas, también se dedica a la crianza de cerdos desde hace 30 años trabajo que aprendió de sus padres. Para llegar a su trabajo Maura tiene que caminar un kilometro, su horario es de 7:00 am a 4:00 pm.
El préstamo que esta solicitando en CREDICAMPO, es para la compra de fertilizantes para poder mejorar su cosecha y obtener más ganancia y así poder satisfacer ñas necesidades de su familia.
Maura sueña con ampliar sus actividades de hortalizas, la crianza de cerdos, mejorar su vivienda y poder darles estudios a sus hijos.
texts.en: Maura is 56 years old, married, and has 4 children: 5, 6, 17, and 25 years old. Three of them are still studying. Maura studied until the first grade, she couldn't continue her studies due to the economic situation of her parents. Her husband works as an office worker. Maura works in agriculture and vegetables, and she has also raised pigs for 30 years which she learned from her parents. To arrive at her job Maura has to walk a kilometer, her schedule is from 7:00 A.M. to 4:00 P.M. The loan that she is requesting in CREDICAMPO is to buy fertlizers to be able to improve her harvest, improve her earnings, and to be able to satisfy the needs of her family. Maura dreams of increasing her vegetable growth, raising pigs, improving her lifestyle and being able to send her kids to school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers

loans.name: Jannelyn

texts.en:
Jannelyn is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Jannelyn is 34-years-old and has three children who are currently in school.

Jannelyn's house was destroyed by super typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. She has restarted her business and is committed to regain what she lost. Jannelyn is taking out a PHP 9,500 housing loan through NWTF to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to build a house for her family.

Jannelyn has been with NWTF since 2010 in her pursuit to rise out of poverty. With your help, she will be able to start once more in a new home. In the future, Jannelyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Wilma works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising goats. Wilma is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF to purchase additional bundles of fishing nets for her fishing business.

Wilma has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional bundles of fishing nets

loans.name: Juda

texts.en:
Juda is 39-years-old and married with three children. With three children currently in school, Juda works very hard to provide for them.

Juda's business and family home were destroyed by super typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Juda has restarted her general store business and now needs to provide her family with safe shelter.

Juda has taken a PHP 7,000 housing loan through NWTF to purchase materials to rebuild her family home.

She is using this loan to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.
